We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private HeikinAshi _heikinashi;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_heikinashi = HeikinAshi(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_heikinashi.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "HeikinAshi Open", _heikinashi.Open);
    Plot("My Indicators", "HeikinAshi High", _heikinashi.High);
    Plot("My Indicators", "HeikinAshi Low", _heikinashi.Low);
    Plot("My Indicators", "HeikinAshi Close", _heikinashi.Close);
    Plot("My Indicators", "HeikinAshi Volume", _heikinashi.Volume);
    Plot("My Indicators", "HeikinAshi Current", _heikinashi.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.heikinashi = self.HeikinAshi(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.heikinashi.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "HeikinAshi Open", self.heikinashi.Open);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "HeikinAshi High", self.heikinashi.High);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "HeikinAshi Low", self.heikinashi.Low);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "HeikinAshi Close", self.heikinashi.Close);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "HeikinAshi Volume", self.heikinashi.Volume);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "HeikinAshi Current", self.heikinashi.Current);
